purpose: Support HR and leadership in conducting structured annual performance reviews with trackable employee evaluations and follow-up goals.
business_value: Ensures compliance with corporate evaluation processes
Provides leadership with data to support promotions or training plans
Allows HR to document improvement plans and actions

mvp_components.app_details: A model-driven application to manage the performance review process, including forms for self-assessment and manager input, tracking review status, and reporting compliance.

app_screens.screen_details: Structured form for self-assessment and manager input.

features.forms: Customizable forms to capture self-assessment and manager input for performance reviews.
features.views: Predefined views to display performance reviews by status, employee, and department for HR Reviewers and Managers.
features.business_rules: Rules to enforce field requirements, visibility, and editability based on the review status and user role.
features.workflows: Automated multi-step workflows to manage the review process from draft, through review, to confirmation.
features.security_roles: Configured security roles to define permissions for Employees, Managers, and HR Reviewers according to the hierarchical reporting structure.
features.field_security_profiles: Profiles to restrict access to sensitive fields within the performance review form based on user roles.
features.audit_history: Enabled audit history to track changes and maintain a log of manager feedback history on employee profiles.
features.charts: Charts to visualize compliance data, such as the number of reviews completed versus overdue.
features.dashboards: Dashboards for HR Reviewers and leadership to monitor review cycles and track overall compliance.
features.record_status: Status field to track the review record's lifecycle (e.g., draft, in review, confirmed).
features.read_only_after_submit: Business rule or workflow to make review records read-only after final submission.

app_screens.screen_details: Tracks the status of reviews by employee and department.

features.views: Custom views to display the status of reviews by employee and department, including filters for review cycle stages (draft, review, confirm) and overdue reviews.
features.security_roles: Configured security roles to ensure employees can view and confirm evaluations, managers can submit and edit performance reviews, and HR reviewers can monitor review cycles.
features.business_rules: Business rules to enforce read-only access to review records after final submission.
features.forms: Custom forms for displaying review status with relevant fields for tracking purposes, including fields for employee, department, review stage, and due dates.
features.charts: Charts to visualize the distribution of review statuses across departments or review stages.
features.workflows: Automated workflows to manage the multi-step review process, including transitions from draft to review to confirmation stages.
features.hierarchical_security_model: A hierarchical security model to ensure access follows the reporting structure within the organization.

app_screens.screen_details: Reports on compliance, indicating who is overdue for a review.

features.entity: An entity to store performance review records with fields for review status, employee, department, and due dates.
features.security_roles: Custom security roles for Employee, Manager, and HR Reviewer with permissions aligned with the PRD.
features.views: A view to filter performance review records by overdue status.
features.powerbi_integration: Integration with Power BI for reporting capabilities.
features.powerbi_dashboard: A Power BI dashboard embedded within the Model-Driven App to display the compliance report.
features.business_rules: Business rules to ensure review records are read-only after final submission.
features.hierarchical_security_model: A hierarchical security model to ensure access follows the reporting structure.

mvp_components.flow_details: Manages the multi-step workflow for the performance review process, from draft to review to confirmation.

flow_actions.action_details: Allows submission of a draft review.
Enables managers to review and edit performance reviews.
Locks the review for confirmation, making it read-only.

post_mvp_modules.details: Allows creation of individual development goals and integrates with the internal Learning Management System (LMS).
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the ModelDrivenApp to include a new screen for development goals, ensuring seamless integration with the existing performance review process and LMS.

post_mvp_modules.details: Adds a historical view of manager feedback to the employee profile within the application.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Incorporate a feedback history screen into the ModelDrivenApp to provide context for performance reviews and support informed decision-making.

permissions: Submit and edit performance reviews for reports

technical_scope: Access control based on hierarchical structure

constraints: Access must follow hierarchical reporting structure
Review records must be read-only after final submission
